content.html: I know you believe you mean well, but please don’t preach the gospel every day. Please do not foist your religion on those who do not ask you to. Please don’t. If you want to be a good Christian, lead by example: be kind, compassionate, and love your neighbor. Period.
content.value:
I know you believe you mean well, but please don’t preach the gospel every day. Please do not foist your religion on those who do not ask you to. Please don’t.

If you want to be a good Christian, lead by example: be kind, compassionate, and love your neighbor. Period.
